price: 19. Voilà qui est un rappel. Prenne donc qui voudra le chemin vers son Seigneur !
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
